description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items: Funeral of Heinrich Lubke, second President of the Federal Republic; Chancellor Brandt visits London; scenes from an international gymnastic contest, and the training of Germany's women gymnastics; Munich prepares for the Olympics; naive paintings exhibited in a printing shop in the artists' quarter, Schwabing; final of German indoor handball championship with a win for Frischaur Goppingen.
